title: ‘Scream’: The Oral History
description:
Alan Siegel interviews the cast and crew of ‘Scream’ and uncovers what it took to get the iconic horror film made.You can read the written version of this piece at theringer.com.
Host: Alan Siegel
Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
